meanings.definition: Relating to or used in a procession.
meanings.sent1: The processional music played as the parade moved along the street.
meanings.sent2: The processional march included colorful banners and flags.
meanings.sent3: The processional attire of the participants was quite festive.
meanings.sent4: The processional decorations added a touch of elegance to the event.
meanings.sent5: The processional route was lined with cheering spectators.

meanings.definition: A hymn, chant, or other piece of music sung or played during a procession.
meanings.sent1: The choir sang a beautiful processional as they entered the church.
meanings.sent2: The processional echoed through the cathedral, filling the space with music.
meanings.sent3: The processional had everyone tapping their feet to the rhythm.
meanings.sent4: The processional melody lingered in the air long after the parade had passed.
meanings.sent5: The processional tune was so catchy, it stayed in my head all day.
